summary: An overview of the politics, social effects and problems associated with the rising epidemic of American obesity.

Butz|Richard Carmona|Bill Clinton|Deborah Cohen|Ann Cooper|Walter Cronkite|Morgan Downey|Arthur Frank|Barry Glassner|Tom Harkin|Jim Hightower|Mike Huckabee|Michael F. Talbott|Lionel Tiger|Brian Wansink|Margo Wootan
title: Killer at Large
